meanings.definition: The act of skiing on water while being towed by a motorboat.
meanings.sent1: Waterskiing is so much fun on a sunny day at the lake.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy waterskiing during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The ducks on the lake were amazed by the waterskiing humans.
meanings.sent4: Her grace on the water was like a professional waterskiing show.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the motorboat echoed during the thrilling waterskiing event.

meanings.definition: The sport or recreational activity of waterskiing.
meanings.sent1: I want to learn waterskiing so I can join the water sports team.
meanings.sent2: Waterskiing requires balance and skill to glide smoothly on the water.
meanings.sent3: The family picnic by the lake turned into a spontaneous waterskiing competition.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to waterskiing was like a passion that drove him forward.
meanings.sent5: The waterskiing championship brought together athletes from around the world.
